text: Enga Ooru Sippai (English: Sepoy of our town) is a 1991 Tamil language drama film directed by K. Manimurugan and written by Sangili Murugan. The film features Arjun, Sree Bhanu and M. N. Nambiar in the lead roles. The film had a musical score by S. A. Rajkumar and was released on 14 April 1991.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qNn02f8NU3chttp://www.in.com/tv/movies/ktv- hd-465/enga-ooru- sippai-69309.htmlhttps://tvschedule.in/Movies/Movie/Index/278287/Enga-ooru- Sippai ==Cast== *Arjun *Sree Bhanu *M. N. Nambiar *Senthamarai *Sangili Murugan *S. S. Chandran *Senthil *Kovai Sarala ==Soundtrack== The film score and the soundtrack were composed by film composer S. A. Rajkumar. The soundtrack, released in 1991, features 4 tracks. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! Track !! Song !! Singer(s)!! Duration |- |1 || 'Paadu Thambi' || || |- |2 || 'Poovo Thaeno' || || |- |3 || 'Pallivanam' || || |- |4 || 'Valli Theriyamai' || || |} ==References== Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Tamil-language films Category:Films scored by S. title: Enga Ooru Sippai
